articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Sept. 10)
articles.description:
ABINGTON 27 Camp St. One-family Cape Cod, built in 1983, 2,265 square feet, 7 rooms, 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, on 26,988-square-foot lot. $710,000 165 Oak St. One-family Colonial, built in 1986, 2,090 square feet, 9 rooms, 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, on 14,792-square-foot lot. $622,500 71 Groveland St. One-family conventional, built in 1933, 1,524 square feet, […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Sept. 10) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Recent home sales in Greater Boston show varied prices and sizes, impacting local housing market dynamics.
Abington's 27 Camp St. sold for $710,000, highlighting demand for family homes.
Increased sales activity may affect housing availability and prices for Boston residents.
